attributes.additional_details:
Approaching the Olympic Village roads are a mess, with litter, graffiti, abandoned road work signs, broken fences and weeds.

The A1 (especilly at jct with M25/A1081) A12/M12 and A13, A406 & A205, all of the M25 and much of the M23, M4, M3, M11, M20 are very poor already.
.
Tens of thousands already pass along these routes and in the games there will be many, many more.

Gov't needs to ensure that all routes are kept spotless and all agencies pool together to have one 24hr unit solely responsible to keep routes clean. This includes all motorways and A roads from a radius of at least 40 miles from Stratford or the distance from the airports of Luton, Gatwick, Stansted and Heathrow.

Non London venues to have similar with limits of at least 10 miles from any venue.

Use to be made of those on community orders to help the clear up and sponsors to have a levy placed on them of 50 pence per attendee to the Games.
